solution_line_template: Elise has bought a total of {first_bag_kg} kg + {second_bag_kg} kg = <<{first_bag_kg}+{second_bag_kg}={total_bought}>>{total_bought}kg of dog food.
This means she already had {total_now} kg – {total_bought} kg = <<{total_now}-{total_bought}={already_had}>>{already_had}kg of dog food.
